# Mermaid Editor

Online Mermaid diagram editor with live preview and SVG/PNG export. No backend, no login required.

## How to use from AI

To open a diagram in the editor, base64-encode the Mermaid code and append it as a `?code=` query parameter:

```
http://mermaid2pic.run.place/?code={base64(mermaid_code)}
```

### Example (JavaScript)

```js
const code = `graph TD\n  A[Start] --> B{Decision}\n  B -->|Yes| C[OK]\n  B -->|No| D[Fail]`;
const url = `https://mermaid2pic.run.place/?code=${btoa(unescape(encodeURIComponent(code)))}`;
```

### Example (Python)

```python
import base64
code = "graph TD\n  A[Start] --> B{Decision}"
url = "https://mermaid2pic.run.place/?code=" + base64.b64encode(code.encode()).decode()
```

## Supported diagram types

graph, flowchart, sequenceDiagram, classDiagram, stateDiagram-v2, erDiagram, gantt, pie, mindmap, timeline, xychart-beta, gitGraph

## Features

- Live preview with 300ms debounce
- Export as SVG or PNG (2x resolution)
- 5 themes: default, dark, forest, neutral, base
- Hand-drawn style toggle
- Shareable URL via `?code=` or `#hash`
